评论详情: I really like these. The color is great and I liked the look, but the shoe is too small, though I run a 7.5 and these are supposed to be 7.5-8. I'll try a larger size and hope it works.
Great product, keep selling more varieties and that size  Thank you
The round heel is nice and the cushion was good.

评论概述: pretty fair value depending on later durability
评论详情: I wont know anything for sure until I have worn then a while and check out their durability, but they feel good for now.
I got these in black and white, very comfortable and I'm pleased with the quality. I will definitely buy these again.
These are great!! So comfortable and the extra room in the toe box is very much noticed and appreciated. Great shoes for a casual outfit or walk.
These are so, so comfy! The toe box is perfect and I love that they’re barefoot shoes but also have a 6mm sole. I can feel the ground but with cushion :) love them

评论概述: High quality minimalist shoes at a great price!
评论详情: I have owned a pair of the Saguaro sandals for a few years, and they are the most comfortable sandals I’ve ever owned, so I picked up a pair of these Saguaro minimalist shoes to give them a try!  They are very high quality and a great value for the price point! The fit is wonderful and they are durable and functional. The offer the best arch support I’ve experienced in a minimalist or barefoot style shoe. Definitely worth the purchase! Give them a try!
I ordered these based on the measurements provided but they just didn't fit like I wanted them to.
great shoe but not proportioned for my foot  so sent them back so I sent them back and the search continues.
I could use a little more stack height, otherwise perfect and a keep nonetheless.
ordered my normal size but they run small in this style so order a size up
The shoes had the wide toe box and zero drop sole but the material was so flimsy that it would not even hold its shape so I returned them.

Word of caution, I feel this run fairly large. I have had many barefoot style shoes and these were by far the biggest. They ran so big, they were giving me blisters. I added an additional insole so my foot wouldn’t slide around so  much and that solved the problem. Other than that I like them, well made.

评论概述: Love these, I bought a second pair
评论详情: Very lightweight. A true barefoot shoe in that it’s pretty flat. Not recommended for people who need arch support. So far they’ve held up good
Wasn't sure about these when buying them. When I got them the fit and  feel was great. Definitely worth the value.
These lower priced barefoot, zero drop shoes are perfect for everyday wear and playing with my young child. I got the red wine color and love them!

After having ankle surgery, I am getting back into a barefoot lifestyle again. Many years ago I wore the Vibram five finger shoes, but eventually had to give them up due to the aforementioned bad ankle. Now that I'm back, I didn't want to go back to the 5 finger shoes, but definitely wanted to get back to zero drop and toe freedom. I purchased a few different pairs of this style shoe, but none were quite right... until I found this pair. I had the red pair for a couple weeks decided to get the white for my European vacation (cute enough to go with dresses or just pants or shorts). I'm not a very athletic person and live a pretty sedentary lifestyle (again, bad ankle made things very hard). So I knew that this might be really hard given the amount of walking to happen on vacation. But it was a total success!! I did 7-10 miles per day according to the apple watch. This was hands down the best shoes I could have hoped for. I took a spare pair of hiking style shoes along just in case. I wore them one day and my feet were miserable. My legs and feet hurt without a doubt since they were doing mileage beyond their norm. And walking on the cobblestones in Belgium and Italy was really tough on the feet. But there is no better option that I could have had. My feet and legs grew so much stronger over the course of those three weeks. I wouldn't recommend newbies going that hard that fast, but I knew kind of what to expect. Now my goal is just to maintain that strength and keep wearing these shoes!! Highly recommend. One other note - I did add a really flat (zero drop) cheap gel insoles that I got a the big retail W store just for some extra protection. Perfect. If you are new to barefoot, I would highly recommend these as great transition pairs. The toe space and zero drop are really great.

评论概述: The Best Shoes I’ve Ever Worn!
评论详情: Ever since I was a kid, I've had issues with wearing regular shoes, so I decided to take the plunge and test out barefoot shoes. To my surprise, they were incredibly comfortable and didn’t even feel like they needed to be broken in. So far, I’ve worn them everywhere, including a fall festival today. My feet have never felt better! Usually, after walking on hard surfaces, my feet would be extremely achy, and my little toe would be swollen and throbbing. But not with these shoes! Even after being on my feet for hours, my baby toe has not swollen at all, and my feet are barely sore. It’s a miracle! At this point, I’m considering replacing all my shoes with barefoot-style options. I don’t know if I’ll ever go back to conventional shoes now. This has truly been life-changing!

There’s a lot I like about this shoe.  The size seems good, but definitely size up a little.  My custom insoles work well.  Pleased with the green and black color.  The only cons I’m seeing so far is the rough texture on the inside and the irritating fact that the tongue curls under.  I have permanent nerve damage in my feet, and these issues could do some damage before I realize it.  The quality seems okay, but they are definitely not worth the $50 I paid.  I haven’t decided if I will keep them yet.

评论概述: Good shoes for healthcare workers/everyday walking!
评论详情: These shoes are great shoes if you’re a healthcare worker or on your feet a lot. My feet no longer hurt but I also pair them with compression sock when I work. I got a 7.5 , i probably would have been fine with a 7, but I have sensory issues with my shoes so I went up half a size. These shoes are definitely good if you have a wide foot, definitely gives your foot enough room. The style is pretty basic, nothing big and grand about them, I don’t think they were worth the money I paid, but they’re definitely good shoes. Paying $54 for a pair of shoes hurts a little lol. These shoes are definitely NOT slip resistant, I about did the splits in the middle of my nursing home kitchen.
I just love these shoes comfortable and lightweight
Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. They wear well. Laces are nice and long. I would buy again!

I think these are decent and relatively comfortable, but the soles are very very thin and there's little arch support. I wouldn't recommend these shoes if you're looking for something to walk long distances in, or if you have to spend hours on your feet during the day.
Love them. So comfy. I wear them everyday and they are holding up great so far. No pain or discomfort while wearing.

I love the look. i love the wide toe box. I love the color. Easy to put on. Easy to take off. But.....when you slip your foot out the shoe liner comes out, and you have to tuck it back in every time. Annoyance. I am a gardener, my feet get wet......i am one week into wearing these shoes. Shoes really starting to stink after getting some moisture. No it is not my feet. I have many pairs of shoes i rotate thru. None of them are stinky after getting wet. Will not purchase again

评论概述: Pointy toe, Smells toxic, Not natural toe box, cheap
评论详情: The pointy toe defeats the purpose because they were supposed to be a natural minimalist toebox and they aren't.  These are exactly like the Amazon Whiten or Relxfeet brand that are cheaply made in China with no box so the toes come smashed. They could be made by the same factory they are so similar.  The off gassing of the toxic plastic is awful.  The toe turns up at the end so they aren't a natural shoe. Natural minimalist shoes are completely flat.

These are my first minimalist barefoot-style shoes, and I think I’m already a convert. As someone with wide feet, finding comfortable footwear is always a challenge, but the wide toe box on these shoes caught my attention. They have been incredibly comfortable. The mesh fabric is breathable, keeping my feet cool and dry.  The shoes are well-made with high-quality materials. Although I’m not an expert on barefoot shoes, I’m really happy with them and would definitely recommend them, especially for anyone like me who wants to try barefoot shoes without spending too much.

Wanted to try barefoot shoes for working out/lifting weights. These are so comfy so far and I've even worn them out and about. I ha e a narrow goormt, and the wide toe box doesn't feel too wide nor is the shoe sloppy on my foot. I think I may become a barefoot shoe convert!
Very comfy, great colors, good quality for less $$. Definitely recommend.

评论概述: Doesn't feel like a barefoot shoe
评论详情: The craftsmanship, zero-drop sole, and non-slip sole all seem good. After reading reviews, I bought an 8.5 in women's, thinking the size up would ensure enough room. Even with sizing up, my toes touch the front of the shoe. Apart from sizing, and why I am not simply exchanging the shoes, is that these are not true barefoot shoes. There is arch support. A true barefoot shoe lets your foot just be how it is shaped, without a formed sole or insole. I have a narrow foot. The toe box is too narrow to allow my toes to spread out while walking. It's angled in like regular shoes. These didn't work for me.

评论概述: Honestly, I was about to send them back
评论详情: When I first tried these on, I wasn't too keen on the way they looked. Maybe a little too dorky. Next morning I decided to try them on again, walked around a little and I'm hooked!  They feel so good, particularly walking outside where the ground is uneven. If you have children, you may remember the pediatrician telling you not to put them in shoes too soon after they begin walking. I'm guessing it's that "barefoot feel" that shoes like this give. It's sending signals to your brain about how to use your body based on what's underfoot. And the unevenness feels like a foot massage. All those signals you don't get when you wear shoes with a stiff sole and your toes bound into a narrow shape.  Try a pair and you'll see what I mean. And BTW, these seem to be well made, too, so there's that. ;-)

评论概述: Size is an issue in my case
评论详情: The shoes could be wider and roomier in the toe box but even though I wear a solid size 9, my toes scrunch up against the front of the shoe. Since I want shoes for my two mile daily walks, I knew right away that this would be a problem. I have four other pairs of Saguaro water shoes for warm weather so the sizing surprised me. I will have to think about ordering the next size up. The material does seem a little stretchy and the sole is comfortable. Sorry the sizing was so off for me. Returning them.

These shoes are amazing! They’re comfy, stylish, oh and did I mention comfy? If I were to compare their comfortability to another barefoot shoe they’re as comfortable as vivobarefoot primus asana 3, if not more comfortable, for less than half the price. I’m a male size 9.5 US and the 9.5 - 10 fit my feet perfectly. They will have a thumb width of space in toe box since they are barefoot shoes. If you’re on the fence about buying these, just buy them! They’re worth it!

I had high hopes for these, but they just didn’t work for me. My feet are a little wider and the curve of the sole dug into the sides of my foot. They might work better for someone with narrow feet. I also found them a bit scratchy.

I recently purchased the Saguaro Forestep Ⅰ Minimalist Barefoot Shoes, and I'm pleased with my experience overall!  Exceptional Comfort:  These shoes are incredibly comfortable right out of the box. The minimalist design allows for natural movement, and I appreciate the wide toe box, which gives my feet ample room to splay. They feel great for all-day wear, whether I'm running errands or going for a casual walk.  Great Price Point:  For the quality and comfort they offer, these shoes are surprisingly affordable. It's refreshing to find a well-made minimalist option without breaking the bank. They provide excellent value for anyone looking to explore barefoot-style footwear.  Lightweight Design:  The lightweight construction makes them feel almost like you're walking barefoot. This characteristic enhances the overall comfort and makes them a great choice for various activities, from casual outings to light workouts.  Zero Drop Sole:  The zero drop sole promotes a natural running gait and encourages foot strength. I’ve found them beneficial for my foot health, as they allow my feet to move as nature intended.  Sizing Consideration:  The only reason I'm giving them 4 stars instead of 5 is that the sizing can be a little tricky. I recommend checking the size guide carefully, as they may run slightly larger or smaller depending on the style and fit you're used to.  Overall Satisfaction:  The Saguaro Forestep Ⅰ shoes have exceeded my expectations in terms of comfort, style, and affordability. If you're looking for a minimalist shoe that won't break the bank, I highly recommend giving these a try. They make it easy to experience the benefits of barefoot footwear without sacrificing comfort!

When I got these shoes, I had ordered two different brands to compare them. These were her favorites and she wants me to look into possibly getting another pair or another color. She said they were comfortable and fit great. The price was good. The only drawback was that she said they weren’t super good with traction if stepping in something very slippery, but that sounds like every shoe to me.

I ordered these for my husband and this is his review - These are comfortable and lightweight. When I tried them on I thought they’d be terrible because the domes are so thin, however when I gave them a try I realized I was wrong. Your feet just sort of hug into them, sorry but that’s the best way I can describe it. It’s like walking barefoot but with protection. They’re put together well and seem to be pretty durable. They fit TTS, keeping in mind the shoebox is wide. That’s the only way for it to be the same as being barefoot, the front of your foot is free. These also look good. Much more stylish than the original barefoot shoes. I recommend these for comfort and style.

These shoes are definitely more like "barefoot" than most shows. They aren't bad but aren't something you would walk around everyday in or use for work shoes unless you add some support yourself. I have insoles for even regular shoes though so I really needed them with these. Oddly, this minimalist approach might be better for people who need strong arches because it was easier to place your own supports in without your foot being pushes out of the shoe. The quality isn't bad either, the design in simple but not bad looking, and I really like how breathable they are. The fabrics breathability and how they are would make for good running shoes but I just can't without an addition. Since an addition is needed all I can say is that these shoes are good but not great.

Really nice shoes, you only have to mesure your feet correctly to choose the right size, feels like going barefoot feels good and the materials looks good, lets see how much they last, the shipping to Perú was really fast, less than 2 weeks… good
These shoes really are soft and lightweight. Love the feeling and how airy they feel. Stylish!

评论概述: Shoes For People Who Hate Shoes.
评论详情: I am a barefoot gal. Unless required by law I am reluctant to cover my feets with anything too restrictive. But sometimes shows are required. Either because we live in a society or because the sun turns the walking surface into a hibachi.  These shoes? Oh my barefooted goddess. I love them. My toes have room. My skin can breath. Nothing feels confined or squished into a toe box. I also do t notice any weight, some shoes are mobster inspired concrete foot traps. Not these!!  They look good. Fit well. The additional grip is great for hiking or walking in wet areas. They also dry crazy quick. My shoes are dry by the time I get back to my car. Hold up to wear and tear. They have even replaced my favored flipflop for foot cover minimalism.

评论概述: Nice alternative for half the price.
评论详情: I really like these shoes. I was very happy with them from the moment I opened them. I normally wear Lems, or Xero shoes but I thought "lets give these a shot for 1/2 the price". Because of them being less expensive I was really expecting poor quality. However, these seem like they are made just as well and are just as comfortable. I have worn them in multiple applications from cutting lawns (work) to taking the dog for a walk. So far they have been great for all of them. My only slight complaint is that the inside sole has a bit of a bumpy texture on the bottom of the feet (you forget about it almost immediately). I would give these a shot if you are looking to get into the minimalist shoe game and a lesser price point.

These are not the most attractive shoes but my husky loves them for comfort. He says they feel nearly like walking barefoot. There’s no arch support in them, so if that’s a concern for you, I’d skip these. They fit great and run pretty true to size. They’re very lightweight. The quality isn’t excellent but they work for his needs at this price point.

评论概述: Run to buy these barefoot shoes!
评论详情: I purchased these after looking at the photos/videos and reviews of the shoes. I have had two pairs of vivobarefoot shoes, and while I love the style and zero drop of those shoes, I find the construction to be lacking in quality…which makes me need to replace them more quickly.  Cue these shoes - the fit and style is similar to the Vivos, but at a third/fourth of the cost and better quality construction. I’m now a convert and will continue to purchase these from now on. A quality barefoot shoe, that looks amazing and is perfect for heavy lifting.

评论概述: Nice design and wide at toes area
评论详情: I always have an issue with shoes that are narrow at the front and make my toes hurt.  These are fantastic because the fronts of the shoes are nice and wide and are very comfortable. Light and easy to wear.

I got these shoes for my husband, and so far he really likes them. They appear to fit true to size (at least for him - I got his normal tennis shoe size and he says they fit well). They are extremely lightweight, and the fabric is nice and breathable, making them good tennis shoes for the summer.  My husband wore them walking around the zoo and said he felt they were comfortable, though the cushion on the bottom wasn't anything "wow." He said he thinks with a shoe insert they would be perfect. He really likes the wide toe box and says that it allows for additional comfort, even when your feet are a little swollen. He's worn them several times now and is very satisfied with them.

I like the looks of these shoes and the fabric, but since the size was 9-9.5 and I wear a 9, they are somewhat large on me. They don't have a lot of arch support in them, so I added insoles, but I add insoles to almost all my shoes. I wore them all day and never noticed them on my feet, which means they are comfortable. I like them, but a different color would have been nice, and if I had known they run as large as they do, I think I could have used the 8-8.5. They are nice shoes though.

For a white shoe, this pair has held up well for fairly consistent use. We have spot cleaned these and have now covered them with a stainguard and they are doing great. These are very comfortable and the wide toe box is EXTREMELY beneficial for comfort and breathability. This isn't a heavy duty shoe - more lightweight in nature - but not fully breathable like many activewear shoes. It is a great balance between durability, comfort, and stylish. Great product!!

These shows are very narrow. I don’t recommend them for wide feet. They will be very uncomfortable.  The shoes are also flat, with very little support. The quality is so-so. They look okay, but are not very comfortable.

评论概述: Plasticky Sound While Walking, Run Small
评论详情: I ordered these shoes due to glowing reviews and claims that they are true to size. However, in my experience, this wasn’t the case. I typically wear Merrell barefoot shoes in size US 10 Men/EUR 44, so I ordered US 9.5-10 Men. They turned out to be a bit small. The shoes delivered are labeled as EUR 43, which is incorrect since most manufacturers map Men’s US 10 to EUR 44. Given that these shoes are US 9.5-10 Men, the size delivered should be 43.5 EUR or 44 EUR. If you typically wear Men’s US 10, I suggest ordering 10.5 Men.  Otherwise, these are pretty average shoes, nothing spectacular. They are comfortable with enough room in the toebox, even with the smaller size I received.  One issue that makes me dislike these shoes is the plasticky sound they make when walking over hard surfaces like tiles or wood floors. I haven’t noticed this issue with any other shoes I own.  Overall, they are decent shoes but not comparable to branded barefoot shoes I’ve used in the past. At their current price of $53, I would really think twice about saving $20-30 by buying these shoes versus paying $70-80 for branded shoes.

评论概述: LOVE THESE! Great for tossing on really quick to run around the back yard!
评论详情: Judith here: I grabbed these because I have another pair similar that I use as water shoes and they are so comfortable. When these arrived I had to toss them on and go out to the gardens - see how I like them. They are awesome! I LOVE THEM! The soles are thick enough to give you protection from the thorns in our yard, but thin enough to feel like you are walking barefoot. I love how they are wider at the ball of my feet, giving me plenty of room to move around. They don't fit tightly or pinch in any way. I love the green colour, too! I am looking forward to seeing if I can wear these to walk around the park's paved road this weekend or next. I like wearing the barefoot shoes for walks!

I am very pleasantly surprised by the comfort offered by these shoes. They remind me of moccasins. I've been wearing them for several days in a row and have no complaints. I will state that the shoe does not offer a ton of structural protection - the soles are thin. But this is what I like. Its close to being barefoot yet still offering good protection for sensitive feet. A++ in my book.
Super low profile, don’t look clunky or boxy but have plenty of room for toes to spread! My husband is a 10W and he got the 9.5/10 size and they fit fantastic! They’re his new go to shoe

评论概述: So much room for my toes
评论详情: My first reaction is that these shoes allow so much room for my toes. They are so comfortable & the weight of old-school tennis shoes (think Keds). I wore these all day & even though I have been experiencing pain from plantar fasciatus & these shoes have no arch support or extra cushioning, I experienced no pain. It really surprised me! I may consider adding another pair of these into my wardrobe since they are so comfortable.

They are kind of goofy looking out of the bag, but when I put them on, they looked great and the comfort level is second to none.  They are light on your feet and super easy to walk in.  I would highly recommend these shoes.
They are very comfortable to walk and weight-lift in!

I ordered my normal size 9/9.5, but these were just a bit too short for me. If I'd sized up to a 10, I think they would have fit beautifully. The wide toe box is a great feature though as I have bunions and need a slightly wider shoe. Fortunately, my daughter wears 8.5, so I gave these to her. She reports that they feel a little weird because of the minimalist design but that she would wear them. They are a good basic white shoe for summer.

评论概述: Very comfortable, wide toolbox, great value, and looks quite good
评论详情: I wanted some minimalist shoes, and these come out a great price. They have a nice zero drop so you have that true barefoot feeling, and they have a nice wide toe box so that my toes are not cramped. They have a nice construction that feels both soft, but not flimsy, and they were comfortable to wear with and without socks. Also comes with a nice linen storage bag. Recommended.

I love a pair of white tennies in the summer... they go perfectly with casual summer dresses and capri pants. So I was thrilled to get these Saguaros. They are well made, nicely supportive, and super cute! I love: + VERY roomy toe box. I love having no mushed toes and even room to wiggle my toes around. + Thick laces which are not slippery, i.e. they don't come untied while you're walking. + Good arch support- I have high arches so I need this. Also I am in my 60s so I need supportive shoes; these feel great! + Removable insoles + Lightweight and breathable- I wore them all day yesterday on a 90 degree beach town visit, and my feet (sockless) were never sweaty or uncomfortable. + Super cute - and the suede patches give a subtle saddle-shoes vibe for interest. + I have never before heard of "zero drop soles" but these certainly are comfortable.  note on size: I am a size 8 so I was torn between 7.5-8 or 8.5. I got the 8.5 because I figured too big is better than too small, and they fit well, with plenty of room in the toe box. Since there is ample room I imagine that the size down would have been fine, but maybe size up if you are between sizes.  Bottom Line: Supportive enough to wear for 10k steps a day... cute enough to wear with a sundress!

These shoes are great for wide feet. While wearing these, there was still room around my feet. Still, the fit was good and I liked that it felt roomy inside. It was very lightweight and comfortable to wear for a day out with kids.

评论概述: Very comfy, easy to clean. I've been wearing them everyday.
评论详情: These are perfect throw on shoes for errands or whatever. They arrive WHITE and are very easy to keep that way. After wearing these, the next morning I'll put them outside in the sun and the sun keeps them nice and white and fresh. These are extremely comfy, lightweight and are perfect for my casual, cute asthetic. I feel you must keep them white though, otherwise they may look funny. LOVE THESE!

评论概述: Most Comfy, Very Sharp and Trendy Looking Barefoot Feeling Shoes!
评论详情: This is the first time I've ever heard of this brand, and I figured I'd try them out (I've been really looking for a nice pair of white shoes/sneakers). I am very impressed with these shoes overall, from the earth-friendly canvas bag they came in, to the overall weight and feel of the sneakers, and the MOST important, the feel and superior comfort level wearing them all day.  I was going to run to go get the mail today, and I was walking to my closet to go "put my shoes on", however when I got to my closet and looked down, I realized I had shoes on the whole time! I'm not kidding, they really have a grounding effect to them, they are very comfortable, and I do like the wide-foot sole feature that they are made with, it makes a tremendous difference. I really like all the different color tones of white that are on the shoe, they all fit well together very well and they look super expensive, with all the attention to detail and the different types of material used to make them (suede, canvas, and other materials) that all went together so synergistically, they are my favorite pair of shoes right now.  I can't really think of anything that I didn't like about them at all, everything was very particular, very well thought of and the manufacturer put a lot of quality and hard work into making them, I think they are a must have for summer!  Most shoes that look really good and are durable with good quality and care, can be super expensive. However, I think that these shoes are very affordable and super fair to what they are priced at because they really well made, and trendy looking pair of the most comfortable shoes I've had ever. Overall, I am completely happy with them, and even looking back at pictures I took, they really were the exact shoe that I was looking for. I most definitely will recommend these to all my family and friends and anyone that is looking for a change for the better with comfort and looks in a great pair of shoes!

I've never had (or even heard of) shoes with zero drop sole. so this is my first experience with them. They are intended to improve posture, something I need to pay more attention to. On top of that, it has a generous toe box, which is hard to come by when shoe shopping in physical stores.  The meshy external material is soft and will pick up dirt and smudges very easily, so consider color and usage when ordering. I expect these to get very dirty quickly.  Shoe sizes are very confusing, so if you're unsure of fit, order several sizes and return the ones that don't fit. I chose 8.5-9 Men's, which came printed on the shoe as "42" (European sizes). It fit as expected.

评论概述: Wide enough for my toes to spread out.
评论详情: These are wide like they were advertised. I got the 9-91/2 size and my toes reach all the way to the top. They might be slightly undersized for the stated size. There is a manmade leather band that covers the toe area and I can feel that thru the shoes. My big toe does feel the pressure from the band. When I first tried them on, I thought they had a tendency to force the side of my feet to fall more to the inside but I put a thin pair of liners in them and wore them out shopping and everything was fine. The netting type of material that covers the shoes is thin. That has a thickness comparable to a sports sock. I think, once the shoes are worn for a couple hours, they are very comfortable.

First off, these are comfortable and fit true to size. The color is not exactly as pictured. The white pictures looks all white in the photos, but in person the suede part of the shoe is a light gray/tannish color. This is not necessary a bad thing, I think it looks really nice and I'm very happy with it.  The toe of the shoe kind of crinkles inwards due to lack of support and flexibility of the fabric. You can see this in the photo I uploaded. Again, not a bad thing, but that is something that you see on the shoe and some people may not like the look of it.  Super lightweight and flexible which is to be expected for a barefoot shoe. Very comfortable. Would definitely recommend. I might buy these in black as well.

Very comfortable and my toes have a lot of room width wise.  Breathable and lightweight with a good sole.  I wore these out all day when it was 95 degrees and my feet never got hot.  I am impressed.  Good product.

评论概述: Comfortable and well built, minimalist barefoot shoe with wide toe box.
评论详情: I like the construction of these minimalist shoes. The thin 6 mm rubber sole is super flexible and has good traction patterns. Another important feature for a barefoot style shoe is the extra wide toe box so your feet can spread out. It’s made of mesh and split leather uppers with strong lace loops. These also feature a zero drop sole that keeps the front and back heel of your foot at the same level, and evenly distributes your foot pressure. It has a thin flat insole that is removable for cleaning.  I wear a size 9 and I suspected these may run small so I ordered the 9 1/2 to 10 size. They fit me a bit big so I would suggest you order true to size. Overall, a well-made and comfortable barefoot shoe.
These shoes look so fresh on my husband! He says they are super comfy too! True to size!

These shoes are comfortable enough for all day wear.  The 6 mil thickness rubber sole provides the bounce and cushion needed.  I love wearing these without socks.  They are very breathable and lightweight.  They fit true to size too!Trust you found this review honest and helpful:-)

评论概述: Size up because these run small
评论详情: We chose these shoes for my husband. We ordered the 10.5 size, based on a similar style in a popular brand name. We should have gone up a size. He says he'll wear them, and that maybe they'll stretch out, but they do not feel very comfortable due to the small size. There is no arch support and they are not what we would call a wide toe box, which is why we had chosen them. If you are older with wide feet, we would not suggest these shoes. At this price point, you can find something better and much more comfortable.

The Saguao forestep shoes are a great addition to  your slip on easy shoes.  Having gone through bunionectomy's on both my feet it is so appreciated to fine a shoes that allows for proper space for your toes.  These shoes are comfortable and easy to clean.  The sole is nicely padded but with those with my same issues may not hold up to a full day of being our feet without adding additional insoles.  I also appreciate the removable inserts that makes it so you can clean the shoe and have it dry more quickly and completely.  I like the shoe and thinking it would be great to add one of the other colors to my shoe wardrobe.  Also love the bag they came in with inspirational quotes!!

Shoe size actually as it should be. I wear a 9,5 2E (Wide) shoe and I was worried with a 9.5 to 10 size because that usually means that it's going to be way too big (long) for me. However they fit just right and the width is perfect. I'm used to a shoe with a little more of a heal than these but after wearing them for a while I'm becoming accustomed to the difference.. They are light and cool, a super nice thing during this hot weather that we are having.  Overall, a nice comfortable shoe that is lightweight and cool on the feet.
